text: The Office of the Vice President includes staff who directly support or advise the vice president of the United States. The office is headed and ran by the Chief of Staff to the Vice President. The office also provides staffing and support to the vice president's spouse. The office is primarily inside the Eisenhower Executive Office Building, that hold the vice president's ceremonial office. There are also offices for the vice president also in the West Wing of the White House, the U.S. Capitol, and inside vice president's official residence. == List of staff members == === Office of the Vice President === * Chief of Staff to the Vice President: Jacob Reses ** Deputy Chief of Staff to the Vice President: Bryan Gray * Director of Domestic Policy to the Vice President: Ben Moss * National Security Adviser to the Vice President: Andy Baker * Director of Operations to the Vice President: Abby Delahoyde * Communications Director to the Vice President: William Martin ** Deputy Communications Director to the Vice President: Luke Schroder ** Press Secretary to the Vice President: Taylor Van Kirk * Counsel to the Vice President: Sean Cooksey === Office of the Second Lady === * Chief of Staff to the Second Lady: Shannon Fisher == References == Category:Vice presidents of the United States
title: Office of the Vice President of the United States
